summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to taxation, amending the Seattle Municipal Code due to changes in the Revised Code of Washington as it pertains to the definition of telecommunications, and the state mandate regarding the required assignment and apportionment of gross receipts to local jurisdictions; making technical corrections; adding a new section 5.45.081; and amending sections 5.30.025, 5.30.050, 5.30.060, 5.45.075, 5.45.080, 5.45.100, and 5.48.050 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
